Column1: Government College Nalwa was established in 1981 with the motto of spreading education at grass-root level, to be able to create better human beings. Based in a rural area, we are proud to state that ours is an eco-friendly campus, with a green campus that is spread across 5 acres. We have a total faculty of 27 staff members, including 24 regular employees and 3 guest lecturers. Our staff includes highly educated professional with the accreditations of Ph.D. and M.Phil. The campus is well equipped with well-ventilated classrooms, a resourceful library, computer room, smart class rooms for integrated and advanced learning, laboratories to encourage research and experimentation, a sports ground, and a campus wide lease line internet. These facilities, amongst few others, provide our students the right atmosphere to expand their horizons to attain success. Existing in the world’s largest democracy, we also practice & preach democratic values on campus via various methods, including – forming a College Council, and various committees and clubs to exercise freedom of assembly and speech, inclusiveness and equality, consent, and voting. Girl students are also provided with certain special facilities in the shape of a Women Cell, Legal Literacy Cell, and a common room so they can realise what their rights are and how they can be effectively practiced, without getting marginalised. The college does not let its location come in the way of providing all the necessary facilities and opportunities to its staff and students. Our commitment to quality education is reflected in our highly qualified, competent and dedicated staff members who not only impart education, but in the process also inculcate moral values in students. Despite most being from the rural areas, our students leave no stone unturned to achieve a level of competence and development that can enable them to succeed. To encourage them further, Sh. Sita Ram Jindal Foundation rewards the students who achieve top results in the college with a scholarship and a gold medal. Ours is an institution with the will to push the boundaries of human knowledge and provide an unparalleled student experience.

* Highly qualified & dedicated staff * Lush green & spacious campus * Well equipped AC library * Solar & RO facility available * College location easily approachable, Free bus pass facility *Good infrastructure with smart class rooms & computer labs * Sports facility for students * Special classes for career counselling * NSS , Placement Cell , Women Cell , Cultural Activities & Subject Societies *Anti Raging Cell , Anti Sexual Harassment Committee & Grievances Cell.

Column1: Ahir College, Rewari is one of the oldest colleges in Haryana which was established in 1945. Hon’ble Rao Birender Singh, Ex. Chief Minister & Union Agriculture Minister of India articulated his vision of distinctive institution against the backdrop of regional history and in the context of the aspirations and needs of contemporary society. His far-sightedness, vision and distinctive practical approach to life has been imbibed, absorbed and followed by our enlightened students. Ahir College is a not-for-profit and Govt. aided institution of higher education affiliated to Indira Gandhi University, Meerpur, Rewari which is committed to provide its motivated students the opportunity to transform their lives through higher education by offering liberal studies and professional programmes in personalized and high quality learning environments thus preparing students to embark on rewarding careers, to continue learning throughout their lives and to act ethically and responsibly in a changing world. Our college also provides students with a rich and vibrant campus life that gears up their personal growth and support them in their transition to responsible adulthood in a rapidly changing world. Hence different facilities in academic, sports and co-curricular activities are provided to boost the achievements of our students in their respective fields. we have more than 3,000 students enrolled in our college. We are running Graduate and Post-graduate courses like B.A., B.Sc. (Med. & Non-Med.), B.Com. B.B.A., B.C.A., and M.Com. The college is running with the help of capable, highly educated, accountable and dedicated faculty members whose rigorous and industrious approach is fructified in achieving the better results than those of university.

Column1: K.L.P. College is a constituent college of Indira Gandhi University Meerpur ,Rewari established in 1964, with an objective of imparting quality education to the aspiring students of South Haryana. Kishan Lal Public College has completed more than five decades in its pursuit of academic excellence. Under the aegis of Public Education Board Rewari, an independent governing body manages the college. Named after an educationist and a visionary philanthropist Late Pt. Kishan Lal Sharma, the college has earned a remarkable reputation in the state as a co-educational academic institute. Late Smt. Javitri Devi (Wife of Late Pt. Kishan Lal Sharma) deserves special mention as the first donor towards the dream of an educational institute in the region. Her generous donation inspired others to come forward and collaborate to make this dream turn into a reality. Beginning its journey with just 250 students and a very limited infrastructure, the college now possesses a proud strength of approximately 3500 students and is successfully running various courses approved by Indira Gandhi University ,Meerpur ,Rewari . The sustained efforts of the efficient governing bodies, hard working and committed faculty members and sincere students have made the college earn laurels in the field of not only academics but sports, social and other co-curricular activities as well. Established as an under graduate degree college initially, the college, in recent years has expanded far beyond its original limit. Its current profile of academic programmes of study includes not only the post-graduate degree courses but it offers a variety of professional and specialized courses also under self-finance scheme. In recent years, the college has undergone a period of rapid infrastructural development. The new teaching blocks, fully air conditioned auditorium, the seminar rooms with audio-visual aids, the library with modification of infrastructure and availability of free internet facility, reflect new academic and enrolment growth. Various developments are ongoing to undertake significant projects of buildings and modernization in the coming years, spacious and well - designed cafeteria with aesthetic touch being the latest addition. The upgrading of classrooms and lecturing facilities, specialized science and computer labs, gymnasium ,indoor and outdoor sports, fully facilitated and digitalized libraries are some of the projects that mark the future not only of the college but also the students who join this college with an aim to become the dynamic learners capable of facing the challenges of life with knowledge, grit and determination.
